segments.text: I see the woman drying dishes, and it’s so sad how unaware she is.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She’s just standing in the puddle, not even noticing the water.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The kids are sneaking cookies, and she has no idea.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is balancing on that stool, and it’s heartbreaking to watch.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl is just waiting for a cookie, like nothing is wrong.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water is overflowing, and it’s like she’s in another world.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder if she’s ever going to notice the mess.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The garden outside looks so peaceful, but inside, it’s a disaster.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I feel so helpless watching this unfold.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This whole scene is just making me feel down.
segments.speaker: PAR
